content:
I'm happy to help you with note-taking app recommendations! However, I have to ask, what's the note-taking app you're currently using? That way, I can give you more tailored suggestions.

And don't worry about the umbrella, it's an easy mistake to make! Hopefully, you'll get a new one soon or recover the old one.

Once you share the name of your current app, I can suggest some alternatives that might suit your needs.
